entry.name: AllianceAccepted
entry.value: "Glady do we accept, my dear friend! Let us rule this world together in the name of God."

entry.name: AllianceRejected
entry.value: "Your offer honors us, but we do not think it would be a wise choice at this point in time."

entry.name: AllianceTerminated
entry.value: "So be it. Leave it to the Lord to sort the chaff from the wheat."

entry.name: DeclareWar
entry.value: "We have been on each other's toes long enough!"

entry.name: Goodbye
entry.value: "We're done here."

entry.name: Greet0
entry.value: "You better come here to beg for forgiveness, sinner."

entry.name: Greet1
entry.value: "Speak freely but true, %3%. God is always watching."

entry.name: Greet2
entry.value: "Welcome, my dear friend! How may I be of service?"

entry.name: NonAggressionPactAccepted
entry.value: "So be it. May our factions prosper in the years of peace to come."

entry.name: NonAggressionPactRejected
entry.value: "You might not like to hear this, my dear %1%, but we are not interested."

entry.name: NonAggressionPactTerminated
entry.value: "The termination of a non-aggression pact has well-known implications. We will remember this, %2%. The holy warriors stand prepared."

entry.name: OfferAlliance
entry.value: "Shall we join our forces?"

entry.name: OfferNonAggressionPact
entry.value: "Let us sign a non-aggression pact."

entry.name: OfferPeace
entry.value: "Any chance we can put our differences aside?"

entry.name: OfferResearchPact
entry.value: "May I interest you in a research pact?"

entry.name: OfferTradingPact
entry.value: "May I interest you in a trade pact?"

entry.name: PeaceAccepted
entry.value: "About time we stop this waste of human life."

entry.name: PeaceRejected
entry.value: "Nice attempt, wimp. As an instrument of God's will, our holy warriors will crush you."

entry.name: ResearchPactAccepted
entry.value: "Let us embrace the wonders of a new age together, my friend."

entry.name: ResearchPactRejected
entry.value: "I am sorry, but for now we will make the journey into the unknown alone."

entry.name: ResearchPactTerminated
entry.value: "What miracle did you discover leading to such an act? It shall not matter, we will find out soon enough."

entry.name: TerminateAlliance
entry.value: "While our alliance surely stood strong under this alien sky, the time has come to part ways."

entry.name: TerminateNonAggressionPact
entry.value: "Our stupid non-aggression pact is hereby nullified."

entry.name: TerminateResearchPact
entry.value: "The scientific profit from our research pact is too one-sided, so I'm canceling it."

entry.name: TerminateTradingPact
entry.value: "To be frank, I think our trading pact is simply not profitable enough for us, and hereby nullified."

entry.name: TradingPactAccepted
entry.value: "Very well! Let the trading commence!"

entry.name: TradingPactRejected
entry.value: "It seems a bit too early for this step."

entry.name: TradingPactTerminated
entry.value: "Your citizens will feel the lack of our goods soon enough."

entry.name: WarAccepted
entry.value: "So shall it be. Our holy forces will subjugate your states in a swift campaign."
